alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 11 at 5:43AM AKDT until October 12 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches. Winds gusting to 50 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...From 1 PM today to 10 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds gusting 40 to 50 mph will cause blowing snow and reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times. The snow will come in squalls with visibility briefly near zero.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
